content:
The chunk discusses a book titled "Panda3D Art Creation with Blender," which is part of a collection of resources for learning Panda3D, including other books, tutorials, and tools. The context situates this book within the broader discussion of educational materials aimed at helping users create game-ready assets using Blender and export them to work with Panda3D across supported operating systems.

The content is aimed at users of all operating systems that are
supported by Panda3D. Panda3D Art
Creation with Blender . This book, from the same author as the book
"Panda3D Game Development", teaches how to create game ready models with
Blender and export them to be usable with Panda3D. Same as the other
book, this one will be maintained and updated to newer releases of the
engine and exporters.
